title: Funniest/Most Insightful Comments Of The Week At Techdirt
description: This week, our first place winner on the insightful side is Thad with a simple comment about Elon Musk’s extremely terrible lawsuit against Media Matters: Of course, as you know firsthand, a suit doesn’t have to have any merit to make life miserable for its targets. In second place, it’s Mechanical Rhizome with a comment […]
